_meanings:
<ab>N.</ab> of an ancient city,
the capital of Magadha, situated
near the confluence of the Śoṇa and
the Ganges, and identified by some
with the modern Pātnā. It is
also known by the names of {#puzpapura#},
{#kusumapura#}; see <ls>Mu. 2</ls>, <ls n="Mu.">3</ls>, and <ls n="Mu.">4. 16</ls>,
and <ls>R. 6. 24</ls> also.
